Combat
Hit Points: 164 Initiative: 8 Armor Class: 18 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Plate Shield: None Weapons: Glaive (+6 1d10); Longbow (+8 1d8+2 R150/600); Morningstar (+6 1d8); Unarmed (+6 1)
Combat Notes:
Aura Of The Sentinel: +6 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Abjure The Extraplanar: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to turn aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and fiends (save DC 16 Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Aura Of The Sentinel: R30' Targets gain +6 Initiative
Divine Smite: Can spend a spell slot after a successful melee attack to inflict +(slot level + 1)d8 HP radiant (maximum 5d8 HP; +1d8 HP vs. undead and fiends)
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Fighting Style (Blind Fighting): R10' Can detect the locations of unseen creatures
Fighting Style (Interception): R5' Can use a reaction to negate 1d10+6 HP damage to another
Glorious Defense: R10' Can use a reaction to give a successful attack target +2 Armor Class and, if this causes the attacker to miss, to attack the attacker, 2 times per long rest
Improved Divine Smite: Melee attacks inflict +1d8 HP radiant
Inspiring Smite: R30' Can use Channel Divinity as a bonus action after a Divine Smite to distribute 2d8+20 temporary hit points
Living Legend: Can change a miss into a hit once per rd for 1 min once per long rest; can spend level 5 spell slots for additional uses
Mortal Bulwark: Can use a bonus action to gain advantage on attacks vs. aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and fiends and to inflict banishment with a successful attack (save DC 16 Charisma negates for 24 hr) for 1 min once per long rest; can spend level 5 spell slots for additional uses
Vigilant Rebuke: R30' Can use a reaction to inflict 2d8+2 HP force on an attacker who triggers a successful Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom save
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 8; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 2; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 0; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Aura Of Courage: R30' Self and allies have immunity to fright
Aura Of Protection: R30' Self and allies +2 all saves
Divine Health: Has immunity to disease
Living Legend: Can use a reaction to reroll failed saves for 1 min once per long rest; can spend level 5 spell slots for additional uses
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; P1: 4; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 2; S0: 2; S1: 1 Attack: P: 8; S: 8 Spell DC: P: 16; S: 16
Spells:
Alarm (P1 [Oath Of The Watchers] Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated Tiny or larger creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Aura Of Life (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum hit point reduction, and raises those with 0 hit points to 1 hit point, for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Purity (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and advantage on saves vs. conditions for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Purity (P4 [Oath Of The Watchers] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and advantage on saves vs. conditions for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Banishment (P4 [Oath Of The Watchers] Abju): R60' Banishes the target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Command (P1 Ench): R60' Target obeys a one-word command from self (save Wisdom negates) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Commune (P5 [Oath Of Glory] Divi): Deity answers 3 yes/no questions; additional uses before a long rest add a 25% chance of failure [R]
Compulsion (P4 [Oath Of Glory] Ench): R30' Self controls target movement direction (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Counterspell (P3 [Oath Of The Watchers] Abju): R60' Negates foe casting up to spell level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level negates a higher-level spell [+Level negates any spell of equal or lesser level]
Dancing Lights (S0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Destructive Wave (P5 Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder, knocked prone, and 5d6 HP of a choice of radiant or necrotic (save Constitution half HP only) on chosen targets
Detect Magic (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Magic (P1 [Oath Of The Watchers] Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Enhance Ability (P2 [Oath Of Glory] Tran): Touched gains advantage on chosen ability checks for concentration up to 1 hr; Constitution also gives 2d6 temporary HP, Strength doubles carrying capacity, and Dexterity negates damage from a 20' fall [+Level affects +1 target]
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in steed form
Flame Strike (P5 [Oath Of Glory] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP of a choice of fire or radiant]
Freedom Of Movement (P4 [Oath Of Glory] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Gentle Repose (P2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 days [R]
Guiding Bolt (P1 [Oath Of Glory] Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Haste (P3 [Oath Of Glory] Tran): R30' Willing target gains double Speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dexterity, and an additional action for concentration up to 1 min and suffers 1 rd of lethargy afterward
Heroism (P1 [Oath Of Glory] Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +2 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Monster (P5 [Oath Of The Watchers] Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Magic Weapon (P2 [Oath Of Glory] Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives a +2 or +3 bonus at level 4 or 6]
Moonbeam (P2 [Oath Of The Watchers] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (save Constitution half; shapechangers have disadvantage and revert form on failure) and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Nondetection (P3 [Oath Of The Watchers] Abju): Willing touched or touched object gains immunity to divination for 8 hr
Poison Spray (S0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Protection From Energy (P3 [Oath Of Glory] Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Revivify (P3 Necr): Restores life and 1 hit point to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Scrying (P5 [Oath Of The Watchers] Divi): Self sees and hears a chosen target (save Wisdom, modified by degree of familiarity, negates for 24 hr) for concentration up to 10 min
See Invisibility (P2 [Oath Of The Watchers] Divi): Reveals invisible and ethereal creatures and objects for 1 hr
Spirit Shroud (P3 Necr): R10' Self hits inflict +1d8 HP choice of radiant, necrotic, or cold, and 1 target/rd suffers -10' Speed for 1 rd, for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP/2 levels]
Summon Celestial (P5 Conj): R90' Summoned avenger or defender celestial spirit obeys self for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases summoned creature's AC, HP, number of attacks, and damage]
Thunderwave (S1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wrathful Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP psychic and frightens (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Fighting Style (Blessed Warrior): Knows 2 C0 cantrips
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips and can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Aura Of Alacrity: R10' Allies gain +10' Speed for 1 rd
Cleansing Touch: Can dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2 times per long rest
Divine Sense: R60' Can discern the location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 3 times per long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Fighting Style (Blessed Warrior): Can replace a C0 cantrip when gaining a level
Harness Divine Power: Can use Channel Divinity and a bonus action to regain a spell slot up to level 3 3 times per long rest
Lay On Hands: Can heal 100 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure disease or poison
Spell Sniper: Can cast attack spells at double normal range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the paladin spell list
Watcher's Will: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to give self and 2 others advantage on Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom for 1 min
